page.title: 19Clubs in the Addingtons.
page.content: In Great Addington there is a gardening club .It is on the first Wednesday of each month.There are 34 members.It costs &3.00 single membership and &5.00 double.They meet in the Village Hall at Great Addington.They have visiting speakers. The Addingtons youth club which meets in the Village Hall has 26 members. It costs 30p each night.They go on a lot of trips (swimming etc.)They have discos once a month . Little Addiington has a working mens club which is open every day.It is 58 years old and has a lot of members. There is a play group in Great Addington.It has 22 children who attend.They meet on Tuesdays and Thursdays. They play with toys and jigsaws etc.There is a W.I which meets weekly.It has 36 members who pay &4 a year.There is a W.I choir aswell.
